overview_of_class: The course examines the economic development of the United States since the Civil War to the present. It focuses on both long-term economic trends (like technological advance and industrialization) and the economic causes and consequences of particular events (like the Great Depression).
name: Economic History of the United States 1865 to Present
title: WCAS ECON 323-2-20 Economic History of the United States 1865 to Present

descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: The course examines the economic development of the United States since the Civil War to the present. It focuses on both long-term economic trends (like technological advance and industrialization) and the economic causes and consequences of particular events (like the Great Depression).

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: problem sets, quizzes and final exam.

subject: ECON
